Documentation.content: Will take a potentially sparse file d and fill in the missing with value v for Numeric Field datasets
Documentation.return: A full Numeric Field dataset with every field populated
Documentation.param: d0 They myriad format Numeric Field dataset to be filled
v The value to assign missing records
Documentation.firstline: Will take a potentially sparse file d and fill in the missing
